title: Sampler
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
medium:
Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk embroidery, linen foundation 
Technique: back, tent, rococo, eyelet, chain, cross, long-armed cross, roumanian, stem, twisted chain, and plaited braid stitches on plain weave
description: Long and narrow 'random spot' sampler with geometric interlacings and flowers. Selvedge at one side.
